Quote: It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop. Things are looking up, Uncle.
Look Bosco! The Kyoshi Warriors are here to protect us! Aren't you excited?
It's terrible when you can't trust the people who are closest to you.
Or we could send in Momo to do some damage!
I was a spiritual brother of your people and a personal friend of Monk Gyatso.
You must gain balance within yourself, before you can bring balance to the world.
Uggh! It tastes like onion and banana juice!
Mai finally gets to wear make-up that's not totally depressing?
I'm talking about conquering the whole Earth Kingdom.
Gosh, you're so confident. I really admire that about you.
In order to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras.

The water flows through this creek, much like the energy flows through your body. As you see, there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on. These pools are like our chakras.
If nothing else were around, this creek would flow pure and clear. However, life is messy, and things tend to fall in the creek.
There are seven chakras that go up the body. Each pool of energy has a purpose, and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck.
First we will open the Earth Chakra, located at the base of the spine. It deals with survival, and is blocked by fear.
What are you most afraid of? Let your fears become clear to you.
Accept the reality that these things happened, but do not let them cloud and poison your energy. If you are to be a positive influence on the world, you need to forgive yourself.
Destructive? Buoyant? And ... Aggh, ehhh! Terrible smelling!

The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the 'stink and sink.'
Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop?
I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know.
Now let's make these people some tea!
My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.
You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life. You are the Avatar and therefore, you are a firebender.
Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek, and more like a ... burping bison.
Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles?
I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.
Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.
If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.

You have indeed felt a great loss. But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us. The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.
Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?
The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.
Yes. We are all one people, but we live as if divided.
Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!
Wooo! Toph, you rule.
Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara?
So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion.
I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.
I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!
Sokka, you don't have to prove anything to me. I'm already proud of you and I've always known you're a great warrior.
